scripts.test: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test-local.yml up --build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec server npm run test
scripts.test:vitest:client: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test-local.yml exec client npm run test
scripts.test:vitest:client:watch: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test-local.yml exec client npm run test:watch
scripts.test:vitest:server: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test-local.yml exec server npm run test
scripts.test:vitest:server:watch: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test-local.yml exec server npm run test:watch
scripts.test:run: docker-compose exec client npm run test
